entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is a person who is part of the Gryffindor team and is asking what is going on.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a member of the Weasley twins and was 20 feet above Angelina when another Bludger stopped her from scoring.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is a member of the Weasley twins and was 20 feet above Angelina when another Bludger stopped her from scoring.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is a person who was being targeted by a Bludger that stopped her from scoring.

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: A Bludger is an object used in Quidditch that is trying to stop Angelina from scoring.

entities.name: gryffindor team
entities.description: The Gryffindor team is a group of people who are huddled together and being targeted by the Bludger.

entities.name: slytherins
entities.description: Slytherins are a group of people in the crowd who are jeering at the Gryffindor team.

relationships.description: Wood is part of the Gryffindor team that is being targeted by the Bludger.
Fred was involved with a Bludger when it stopped Angelina from scoring.
George was also involved with a Bludger when it stopped Angelina from scoring.
The Gryffindor team is being targeted by the Bludger and jeered at by Slytherins.
A Bludger was targeting Angelina when it stopped her from scoring.
